INPUT_MNEMONIC_TIPS: Please enter your mnemonics in original order, separated by spaces.
COPY_KEYSTORE_TIPS: Please copy your keystore to the box
COPY_PRIVATE_TIPS: Please enter your private key to the box
SETUP_PASSWORD_TIPS: Please setup your private key password.
INPUT_PASSWORD_TIPS: Please enter your private key password.
PASSWORD_RULE: Numbers and letters included, min 6 - max 18.
KEYSTORE_ERROR: Illegal keystore file or incorrect private key password.
PRIVATE_EMPTY: The private key should not be empty or length is incorrect.
KEYSTORE_EMPTY: The keystore should not be empty.
CLICK_MNEMONIC: Please click the mnemonics by original order
NEW_PASSWORD_EMPTY: The new password should not be empty.
ORIGINAL_PASSWORD_EMPTY: The original private key password should not be empty.
PASSWORD_ERROR: The private key password is incorrent, please check!
PAYMENT_PASSWORD_ERROR: The payment password is incorrent, please check!
WXPORT_KEYSTORE_TIPS: We recommend that users save their private keys offline. Never send or share your private key over a network-enabled notepad, network disc, messenger app, etc.
KEYSTORE_COPYIED_SUCCRRF: The keystore is copied to copyboard.
BACKUP_MNEMONIC_TIPS: This mnemonic phrase is uniquely generated, and grants you access to your wallet. Do NOT screenshot this page. Carefully write down your mnemonic phrase from left to right on a piece of paper, and save a copy offline. Don’t share your unique phrase with ANYONE. *CAUTION: The Cypherium Team can NOT recover your funds if you lose your mnemonic phrase.
PASSEORD_ERROR: Please enter the correct private key password
EXPORT_PRIVATEKEY_TIPS: It is recommended to use an offline device to save the private key, please do not send or save it to a network-enabled notepad, network disk, chat tool, etc.
EXPORT_PRIVATEKEY_MINER: Export wallet to your PC tool
RECEIVE_ADDR: Warning: This address supports {{value}} only, any other assets transferred may get lost！
COPY_WALLET_SUCCEED: Wallet address copyied to clipboard successfully!
INPUT_ADDR_TIPS: Please enter your CPH wallet address
NONCE_ERROR: Transaction failed, you can raise up the gas to make sure transaction successfully handled.
ADDRESS_EMPTY: The CPH address should not be empty
AMOUNT_SMALL: The amount is too small,must larger than 0.0001
PLEDGE_MINING_SLOGAN: Pledge your CPH to earn more!
INPUT_PLEDGE_AMOUNT: Please enter the amount for pledge
INPUT_DRAWBACK_AMOUNT: Please enter the amount for drawback
PLEDGE_AMOUNT_EXCCEED: The pledge amount excceed your balance
DRAWBACK_AMOUNT_EXCCEED: The drawback amount excceed your pledge amount
PAYMENT_PASSWORD_M: The payment password is empty, you need to set it.
WALLET_NAME_EMPTY: The name cannot be empty, only letters or numbers, and the length cannot exceed 20.
REQUEST_ERROR: Request error, please contact the admistrator.
NETWORK_TIMEOUT: Request timeout, please try it later
BACKEND_ERROR: The backend service can not be connected
BACKEND_NOT_EXIST: The request address can not be found
BACKEND_ERROR1: Backend service error, please try it later
